resources.string: Invest in noise-canceling headphones or earplugs to reduce ambient noise. Stay at a distance from loud sound sources like speakers, machinery, or traffic.
Reduce the amount of time spent in noisy environments.

90 dB: Up to 2 hours
 95 dB: Up to 1 hour
 100 dB: Up to 15 minutes
 105 dB: Less than 5 minutes
